page.title: 01PRINCIPLE FEATURES, SEAFORD
page.content: { SEAFORD}IS ON THE{SOUTH EAST COAST, BETWEEN EASTBOURNE AND BRIGHTON. IT IS A RATHER SMALL TOWN, SURROUNDED BY THE BEAUTIFUL{SOUTH DOWNS.}THE SEA CAN BE FAIRLY COLD IN THE SUMMER.THE WEATHER CAN ALSO BE WINDY.{SEAFORD {HEAD}IS A HEADLAND ON WHICH IS A GOLF COURSE. YOU CAN ALSO HAVE LOVELY WALKS.THERE IS A LOT OF{WILDLIFE}LIKE RABBITS, FOXES, BADGERS AND OTHER ANIMALS. THERE ARE ALSO PLANTS AND FLOWERS. THE PARISH CHURCH IN SEAFORD IS 900 YEARS OLD, IT IS CALLED ST. LEONARD'S. AT EXCEAT IS THE{CUCKMERE RIVER FAMOUS FOR ITS MANY MEANDERS, AND{THE {SEVEN SISTERS COUNTRY PARK}THAT SURROUNDS IT.NEARBY IS{FRISTON {FOREST,}WHERE WOODLAND WALKS CAN BE ENJOYED. A LARGE PORTION OF THE AREA IS FARMLAND. FARMERS GROW CROPS AND KEEP SHEEP MAINLY.
